description:
Dr. Stylish discovered Night Raid’s hideout as he followed Tatsumi.  A battle quickly commenced between Night Raid and Dr. Stylish’s fortified army who struck with a surprise attack.  Tatsumi and Mine are enraged as they see Kakusan equipped with Sheele’s Imperial Arms Extase.  A fierce battle continues within the hideout when suddenly something came down from the Sky...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: マッドサイエンティストを斬る
